official_title: To amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to repeal the limitation on financing for exports to the Soviet Union.

summary.text: Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 and the Trade Act of 1974 to repeal certain provisions (the Stevenson and Byrd Amendments, respectively) limiting the financing by the Export-Import Bank of U.S. exports to the Soviet Union.

titles.title: To amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to repeal the limitation on financing for exports to the Soviet Union.
